T02D2724:92a-1: lo ke shva ra sto tra n'a ma /
T02D2724:92a-2: bod skad du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2724:92a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2724:92a-4: lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btung cing //
T02D2724:92a-5: skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa //
T02D2724:92a-6: 'jig rten dbang byed bdag la skyabs mdzad na //
T02D2724:92a-7: brtse dang snying rje ldan pa skyong bar mdzod //
T02D2724:92a-8: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su nges lhung ba //
T02D2724:92a-9: nyon mongs dba' klong mnyam bzhag gis ni bcom //
T02D2724:92a-10: kho bo brtan par zung zhes kun du du //
T02D2724:92a-11: brtse ba chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2724:92a-12: mig la sred pa'i rab rib nye bar 'tshe //
T02D2724:92a-13: lus ni 'chi bas 'jigs pa'i rnam par du //
T02D2724:92a-14: ji srid mnar med nyam ngar ma song bar //
T02D2724:92a-15: bcom ldan kun tu gzigs la bdag la skyongs //
T02D2724:92a-16: gzhan gyi bud med sun par byas shing bcom //
T02D2724:92a-17: mi shes pa yi srog chags stong phrag bsad //
T02D2724:92a-18: mgon po bdag gis sdig pa ma lus byas //
T02D2724:92a-19: so so'i lus kyi nyes pa nyams par mdzod //
T02D2724:92a-20: gang zhig 'tsho dang bkur sti'i ched rnams su//
T02D2724:92a-21: 'jig rten pa rnams mi 'dod mi bden smras //
T02D2724:92a-22: ma lus dmyal ba gang gis yun ring goms //
T02D2724:92a-23: de rnams 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod //
T02D2724:92a-24: sems can rnams la mi phan bsam pa gang //
T02D2724:92a-25: rang dang gzhan gyis byas la'ang yi rang ba //
T02D2724:92a-26: de 'dir bdag gi yid kyi sdig pa rnams //
T02D2724:92b-0: bsal @92b bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don //
T02D2724:92b-1: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams //
T02D2724:92b-2: dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro ba rnams //
T02D2724:92b-3: sems can nges gnas rtag par nyam thag gang //
T02D2724:92b-4: de rnams srung zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos //
T02D2724:92b-5: des na bdag la snying rjer kun du mdzod //
T02D2724:92b-6: lus kyi lang tsho ngal bar rtogs gyur na //
T02D2724:92b-7: ji srid dmyal ba nyid du ma zhugs par //
T02D2724:92b-8: de phyir bcom ldan khyed la gsol bar bgyi //
T02D2724:92b-9: cung zad btang snyoms mdzad pa gzhan don phyir //
T02D2724:92b-11: bdag gi don phyir bcom ldan nyid dmigs na //
T02D2724:92b-12: yang na brtse ba bsod nams la ltos sam //
T02D2724:92b-13: gang la phongs med mthong ba bskyed par gyis //
T02D2724:92b-14: nyid dran pa yis kun nas yongs tshim na //
T02D2724:92b-15: nyes pa zad par mdzod cig brtse med dam //
T02D2724:92b-16: de yi phyir na bcom ldan gzhan phan mkhas //
T02D2724:92b-17: rnam g-yeng ma mdzad kho bo 'dir ni srungs //
T02D2724:92b-18: glang po rta dang bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D2724:92b-19: rgyal srid tsher ma med dang khyim sna tshogs //
T02D2724:92b-20: sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug par //
T02D2724:92b-21: don gnyer rnams la khyed kyis mtha' yas byin //
T02D2724:92b-22: mig sman ri lu rkang mgyogs grub pa dang //
T02D2724:92b-23: grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags //
T02D2724:92b-24: grub pa gnod sbyin mo ni grong la 'jug /'jig rten dbang po gang gis nyid dgyes pa //
T02D2724:92b-25: rkang lag rnam par lta ba'i sman pa gang //
T02D2724:92b-26: sna tshogs 'jigs chen nad kyis zhub gang //
T02D2724:92b-27: khyed mnyes pa las de rnams lus rgyas shid //
T02D2724:92b-28: nad med yon tan zab mo'i rnam rol 'gyur //
T02D2724:92b-29: mkha' lding sbrul dang gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2724:92b-30: sbyor ba pa rnams rtag par zhi 'thob cing //
T02D2724:92b-31: khyed mnyes gang yin de yi mdun du ni //
T02D2724:92b-32: gshan rje'i pho nya mi 'gro rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D2724:92b-33: de phyir lag pa spyi bor thal sbyar te //
T02D2724:92b-34: spyi brtol mi brtan ngag gis nyin re bzhin //
T02D2724:92b-35: du ba skyabs med bdag ni mchi ba la //
T02D2724:92b-36: bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dor ram ci //
T02D2724:92b-37: mi srun yul la g-yo ba yid dbang po //
T02D2724:92b-38: mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing //
T02D2724:92b-39: lto ba'i ched du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med //
T02D2724:92b-40: bdag gi 'di ni skye bo thams cad lugs //
T02D2724:92b-41: gang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ma myong bar //
T02D2724:92b-42: khyed kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba //
T02D2724:92b-43: bdag 'dir thal sbyar rab btud bdag gi de //
T02D2724:93a-1: rten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod //
T02D2724:93a-2: rmongs dang zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu //
T02D2724:93a-3: khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam pa ste //
T02D2724:93a-4: g-yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag / khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam //
T02D2724:93a-5: bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na //
T02D2724:93a-6: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang po'i sems can skyong //
T02D2724:93a-7: rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las nges rgyal zhing //
T02D2724:93a-8: khyed ni srid pa'i mtsho las pha rol brgal //
T02D2724:93a-9: nad kun mtha' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus //
T02D2724:93a-10: khyed sku 'gro ba kun la mchog tu mdzes //
T02D2724:93a-11: dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2724:93a-12: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du skye bos shes //
T02D2724:93a-13: byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cing sgeg / khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongs su bor //
T02D2724:93a-14: lha yi bsam gtan la ni sems mnyam gzhag / khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor //
T02D2724:93a-15: thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad kyang //
T02D2724:93a-16: kho bo 'dir ni srung ba mi mdzad cing //
T02D2724:93a-17: gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab la //
T02D2724:93a-18: yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las ltung //
T02D2724:93a-19: khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mtha' yas pa'i //
T02D2724:93a-20: skye bo kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir //
T02D2724:93a-21: sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi mdzad pa //
T02D2724:93a-22: nges pa lags sam mdun nas dud mo 'byin //
T02D2724:93a-23: mgon po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su //
T02D2724:93a-24: sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sprin ji ltar //
T02D2724:93a-25: skam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por //
T02D2724:93a-26: ma lus rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab //
T02D2724:93a-27: de ltar bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang //
T02D2724:93a-28: des ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir //
T02D2724:93a-29: po tal ke g-yo ba med pa'i gnas //
T02D2724:93a-30: rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur //
T02D2724:93a-31: zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la /
T02D2724:93a-32: tsarya d'i pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so /
T02D2724:93a-34: // / sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas /
